sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>woman</radical> loves her <radical>catapult</radical> for some good ol' fashioned <kanji>recreation</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You ask the woman what she does for fun... for recreation. She says, she goes out and shoots her catapult.
readingMnemonic: Her favorite thing to shoot at with her catapult for <kanji>recreation</kanji> is <reading>Go</reading>dzilla (<ja>ご</ja>).
readingInfo: Get out of here, Godzilla! I'm gonna shoot you.
